title: Rajeev Chandrasekhar: ‘Big Tech weaponised internet amid conflict, presiding over splinter-net’ - The Indian Express
content: Rajeev Chandrasekhar: ‘Big Tech weaponised internet amid conflict, presiding over splinter-net’  The Indian Express
description: Amid the continued “weaponisation” of the internet by some Big Tech platforms during the ongoing Russia-Ukraine conflict bringing back the focus on the sweeping powers of social media platforms, India is readying a new cybersecurity and data governance framework.
